    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hidden Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2084) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 196 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Vigilante](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=80)

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), Expert in [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10), Expert in [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11), or Expert in [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13); [Vigilante Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2083)

</column>

---

You've learned to hide the magical auras of your gear. During your daily preparations, you carefully tweak any or all of your magic items to appear non-magical. Objects adjusted in this way remain so until your next preparations. A spellcaster using [_detect magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=66) or [_read aura_](/Spells.aspx?ID=246) must succeed at a Perception check against your [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) DC to see through your obfuscations.
